content.json:
# Central Threat Intelligence Dashboard

This dashboard provides a comprehensive overview of your threat intelligence ecosystem, enabling security teams to monitor active indicators, distribution status, and emerging threats.

> **Note:** This dashboard is part of a three-workbook CTI solution that also includes the [CTI Indicator Management](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring/AzureMonitoringBrowseBlade/workbooks) and [CTI Integration](https://portal.azure.com/#blade/Microsoft_Azure_Monitoring/AzureMonitoringBrowseBlade/workbooks) workbooks.

content.query:
// Count of all active indicators by type
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s))
| summarize Count = count() by Type
| order by Count desc
content.title: Active Indicators by Type

content.query:
// Indicators added over time - trend analysis
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "IP", FirstSeen = FirstSeen_t),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Domain", FirstSeen = FirstSeen_t),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "URL", FirstSeen = FirstSeen_t),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "File Hash", FirstSeen = FirstSeen_t)
| summarize Count = count() by Type, bin(FirstSeen, 1d)
| order by FirstSeen asc
content.title: Indicator Growth Trend

content.query:
// Distribution of indicators by target product
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s, Distribution = split(DistributionTargets_s, ", ")),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s, Distribution = split(DistributionTargets_s, ", ")),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s, Distribution = split(DistributionTargets_s, ", ")),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s), Distribution = split(DistributionTargets_s, ", "))
| mv-expand Target = Distribution
| summarize Count = count() by tostring(Target), Type
| where isnotempty(Target)
| order by Count desc
content.title: Distribution by Target Product

content.query:
// Indicators by source feed
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "IP", Source = SourceFeed_s),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Domain", Source = SourceFeed_s),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "URL", Source = SourceFeed_s),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "File Hash", Source = SourceFeed_s)
| summarize Count = count() by Source
| where isnotempty(Source)
| order by Count desc
| take 10
content.title: Top 10 Source Feeds

content.query:
// Expiring indicators for the next 7 days
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. now()+7d)
| extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s, ExpirationDate = ExpirationDateTime_t),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. now()+7d)
| extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s, ExpirationDate = ExpirationDateTime_t),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. now()+7d)
| extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s, ExpirationDate = ExpirationDateTime_t),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and ExpirationDateTime_t between (now() .. now()+7d)
| extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s), ExpirationDate = ExpirationDateTime_t)
| project Type, Value, ExpirationDate, ThreatType = coalesce(ThreatType_s, ""), Confidence = coalesce(Confidence_d, ConfidenceScore_d, 0), Source = coalesce(Source_s, SourceFeed_s, "")
| order by ExpirationDate asc
content.title: Indicators Expiring Soon (Next 7 Days)

content.query:
// High confidence indicators added in the last 7 days
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > ago(7d) and coalesce(ConfidenceScore_d, 0) >= 80
| extend Type = "IP", Value = IPAddress_s, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > ago(7d) and coalesce(ConfidenceScore_d, 0) >= 80
| extend Type = "Domain", Value = Domain_s, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > ago(7d) and coalesce(ConfidenceScore_d, 0) >= 80
| extend Type = "URL", Value = URL_s, Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated)),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true and coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated) > ago(7d) and coalesce(ConfidenceScore_d, 0) >= 80
| extend Type = "File Hash", Value = coalesce(SHA256_s, SHA1_s, MD5_s), Added = coalesce(FirstSeen_t, TimeGenerated))
| project Type, Value, Added, ThreatType = coalesce(ThreatType_s, ""), Confidence = coalesce(ConfidenceScore_d, 0), Source = coalesce(SourceFeed_s, "")
| order by Added desc
content.title: New High Confidence Indicators (Last 7 Days)

content.query:
// Threat type distribution
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "IP", ThreatType = ThreatType_s),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Domain", ThreatType = ThreatType_s),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "URL", ThreatType = ThreatType_s),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "File Hash", ThreatType = ThreatType_s)
| where isnotempty(ThreatType)
| summarize Count = count() by ThreatType, Type
| order by Count desc
| top 20 by Count desc
content.title: Threat Type Distribution

content.query:
// TLP classification of indicators
union 
(CTI_IPIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "IP", TLP = TLP_s),
(CTI_DomainIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "Domain", TLP = TLP_s),
(CTI_URLIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "URL", TLP = TLP_s),
(CTI_FileHashIndicators_CL
| where Active_b == true
| extend Type = "File Hash", TLP = TLP_s)
| where isnotempty(TLP)
| summarize Count = count() by TLP, Type
| order by Count desc
content.title: TLP Classification
